subject: Business
title: Category Creation: Make Your Own Market
description: A short lesson to help you apply Category Creation: Make Your Own Market.

hook.text: Salesforce didn't enter the CRM market. It created 'cloud CRM' and made on-premise software look obsolete.

buildup.text: Category creation means defining a new market space and positioning yourself as the obvious leader.

discovery.text: The creator of a category captures 76% of the total market value, according to Harvard Business Review.

twist.text: Creating a category is expensive. You must educate the market, which means paying for everyone's awareness.

climax.text: HubSpot coined 'inbound marketing' and built a billion-dollar business by owning the category it invented.

punchline.text: Don't win an existing category. Create one and own it.

quiz.question: What percentage of market value does a category creator typically capture?
